name: Paradex
description: ZK powered Layer 2 network purpose built for high-performance derivatives trading

contracts.name: <Name of Mainnet contract 1 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>
<Name of Mainnet contract 2 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>

sepoliaContracts.name: <Name of Sepolia contract 1 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>
<Name of Sepolia contract 2 (remove entry in array if it doesn't apply, add more entries if there are more contracts)>

links.website: <URL of the dapp's website. Leave empty string if non-existent>
links.careers: <URL of the dapp's career page. Can also be 'mailto:example@mydapp.com'. Leave empty string if non-existent>
links.twitter: <URL of the dapp's Twitter account>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.telegram: <URL of the dapp's Telegram>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.discord: <URL of the dapp's Discord invite>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.github: <URL of the dapp's Github>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.youtube: <URL of the dapp's Youtube channel>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.medium: <URL of the dapp's Medium or self-hosted Blog>. Leave empty string if non-existent
links.mirror: <URL of the dapp's Mirror page>. Leave empty string if non-existent

twitterName: Twitter username. Leave empty string if none

teamInfo.founded: Founding date of the project. EXAMPLE: 2022-05-24T00:00:00.000Z

tokens.address: <Address of any ERC-20 Mainnet tokens created by the dapp>

nft.collectionContract: <Address of the NFT contract you wish to showcase>
nft.collectionLink: <https url for link to view full collection>

gallery.description: Exclusive Points Drops and Boosts for new Paradex Ecosystem Partners
